revised_title: Investigating Multivalent Formation and Synaptic Variation in Hexaploid Perennial Grass (Koeleria vallesiana)
tldr: This study examines multivalent formation and synaptic variation in natural populations of the hexaploid perennial grass, Koeleria vallesiana. The research focuses on the relationship between pachytene multivalent frequency and chiasma number, providing insights into the mechanisms controlling synaptic behavior and the evolutionary processes in polyploids.
